description:
Counter-Strike 2 companion that automates in-game tasks, such as accepting match, buying items and more.



Version 2.2.4 changelog
- Fixed a race condition with portable settings
- Some DXGI edge cases fixes
- Added more debug information
- Decided to remove the mobile app entirely as it wasn't really used and mostly broken
- Discord RPC fixes
- Some UI changes
- Map Icons fixes, using cs2-map-icons
Full Changelog: 2.2.3...2.2.4
